text:
The Free Wales Army, or the FWA for short, () was a Welsh paramilitary organisation that wished to establish an independent Wales.
It was formed in 1963 in Lampeter, a small town in Ceredigion by Julian Cayo-Evans.
The group's main objective was independence from the United Kingdom for Wales. They first appeared in public at a protest in 1965 against the construction of the Llyn Celyn reservoir.
The group's members used to march through historic towns, such as Machynlleth, wearing home-made uniforms.
